name: nictusempra
text: A comment left by nictusempra was marked as spam and excluded. nictusempra: What a douche. (reported by mistlethrush, Slab64, Arcibi)

name: zzzleepy
text: does lyle want to hear only the scariest possible lyrics?

name: slab64
text: Isn't that kind of the idea? I would pretty much have the exact same thoughts if I played bass for a metal band.

name: droplede
text: Agreed. Lyle fully understands the bassist's role.

name: highpitch_83
text: Not if he wants to play more than one note... keeping time in the key of B is his primary function in Mister Band

name: mattylite
text: The Achewood Continuity Police, Musical Notation Division, congratulate and chubby you for noticing it is the same note as before.

name: dougthehead
text: This strip always reminds me of School of Rock, which also has an instance where the bassist is only allowed to play G.

name: luckypyjamas
text: a metal band with a serial killer for a frontman

name: waldo913
text: that is pretty metal...

name: cpnglxynchos
text: brutal

name: greenkoolayd
text: A comment left by greenkoolayd was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by CygnusX-1, godfatherofsouls, luckypyjamas, TheGreatestCape, Sock, Rakadin)

name: money4something
text: It is NOT metal, just good music, played well by men.

name: tombsgrave
text: I dunno, I think it's pretty scary for a thief to steal boiled king eyes.  What's he gonna do with 'em?  Somethin' mysterious, I bet.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: a dylan tribute.

name: littlefatdog
text: stolen by a thief, baby

name: excusemesenator
text: he says it like it's such a plot twist

name: johnnyc
text:
It totally is though.

How did the thief get into the kitchen?
Why was the lord being boiled with his beef?
Is this related to the demon larvae?

We'll never know.

name: ttagxamm
text:
If you like Mister Band, you might also like...
Necrofrost

name: pa_ass_nts
text: That's a hell of a domain name they have there... myrrthronth.

name: ttagxamm
text: So it is. I guess we can at least be thankful they haven't chosen one of the logos that look like Cthulhu's weirdly symmetrical nose-pickings

name: cailetshadow
text:
This made me laugh harder than the comic itself.

I would add Mortification to your list. Because the people should know .

name: ttagxamm
text: Oh  <strike>hell</strike>  heaven, yes, Mortification.  Great damn name for a Christian Death/Grind band.  Right up there with Christian doom band Place of Skulls.

name: pa_ass_nts
text: Place of Skulls are pretty rad if you like doom. Its easy to see why pretty much everyone else thinks they are a joke, though.

name: ttagxamm
text: Eff yeah, they are.  I genuinely think that's a bad ass name for a Christian metal band.  Frikkin' Wino played guitar with them for a bit!

name: pa_ass_nts
text: That dude had some straight-up chops.

name: tashara
text:
Those would be very useful as vision tests. Eye charts for black metal vision.
Perhaps I can get a prescription for black, black sunglasses that would allow me to read most of those logos.

name: mangtastic
text: What the hell, most of those are completely unreadable.  What's the point of even having a logo then?

name: ttagxamm
text:
I think of them as something like a secret code. Like the early Christians are said to draw a fish in the sand. Most of them aren't legible, no, but the best of them are recognizable to fans.

Also, I think some of them look pretty bad-ass, in the over-the-top way of so much metal.

name: speedwell
text: nice pete springing anywhere is the scariest thing possible

name: phy
text:
jeepers creepers
where'd you get those
EYES

name: thesyndicate88
text: Can't you...SEE?

name: biomusicologist
text: Yeah, speaking purely as a dude who dicks around on the bass, I'd be really pissed off if the shitty lead singer of a band I was in only allowed me to play one note. It would seem to confirm Teodor's "high functioning generalization" about bassists to everyone listening/watching.

name: lobster_mobster
text: This is one of my absolute favorites. I once played bass for a control-freak singer/guitarist who had a middle-school-esque idea of everything involving love and it always ended up referring to Romeo and Juliet in some way. You could feel my blood boil from the back of the room.

name: comrade_tom
text:
a song is no place to comment on shakespeare.

no place.

name: charchar
text: Nonsense!

name: boredom_man
text: That made so little sense that I can't tell if you're joking or completely illiterate, so I'm chubbying you.

name: charchar
text: Some even got on the mayor!

name: achilleselbow
text: If your loins are haunted, you should probably douche more thoroughly.

name: speth
text: , anyone?

name: hendetta
text: Nice Pete is throwin' it up, son. Just look at that hand.

name: woodenteeth
text:
Please put your hand in the same position Nice Pete has in Panel 5. This is not a very rock and roll pose. Not at all.

Unless he's a little tea pot.

name: woodenteeth
text: Short and Stout.
